contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: not specified
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：未指定

contents.text: Parameters: DSCP value
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：DSCP值

contents.text: Comments: this allows an application to change the DSCP value for outgoing segments.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这允许应用程序更改传出段的DSCP值。

contents.text: o SET_DSCP.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o SET_DSCP.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Set DSCP value'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“设置DSCP值”

contents.text: Parameters: DSCP value
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：DSCP值

contents.text: Comments: this allows an application to change the DSCP value for outgoing packets on a path.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这允许应用程序更改路径上传出数据包的DSCP值。

contents.text: o SET_DSCP.UDP(-Lite):
contents.zh-CHS: o SET_DSCP.UDP（-Lite）：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Set_DSCP'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“设置\u DSCP”

contents.text: Parameter: DSCP value
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：DSCP值

contents.text: Comments: this allows an application to change the DSCP value for outgoing UDP(-Lite) datagrams. [RFC7657] and [RFC8085] provide current guidance on using this value with UDP.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这允许应用程序更改传出UDP（-Lite）数据报的DSCP值。[RFC7657]和[RFC8085]提供了有关在UDP中使用此值的当前指导。

contents.text: o ERROR.TCP:
contents.zh-CHS: o ERROR.TCP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Error_Report'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“错误报告”

contents.text: Returns: reason (encoding not specified) and subreason (encoding not specified)
contents.zh-CHS: 返回：原因（未指定编码）和子原因（未指定编码）

contents.text: Comments: soft errors that can be ignored without harm by many applications; an application should be able to disable these notifications. The reported conditions include at least: ICMP error message arrived and excessive retransmissions.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：许多应用程序可以忽略而不造成伤害的软错误；应用程序应该能够禁用这些通知。报告的情况至少包括：ICMP错误消息到达和过度重传。

contents.text: o ERROR.UDP(-Lite):
contents.zh-CHS: o 错误。UDP（-Lite）：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Error_Report'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“错误报告”

contents.text: Returns: Error report
contents.zh-CHS: 返回：错误报告

contents.text: Comments: this returns soft errors that may be ignored without harm by many applications; an application must connect to be able receive these notifications.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这会返回软错误，许多应用程序可能会忽略这些错误而不造成损害；应用程序必须连接才能接收这些通知。

contents.text: o SET_AUTH.TCP:
contents.zh-CHS: o SET_AUTH.TCP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: not specified
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：未指定

contents.text: Parameters: current_key and rnext_key
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：当前_键和rnext_键

contents.text: Comments: current_key and rnext_key are the preferred outgoing MKT and the preferred incoming MKT, respectively, for a segment that is sent on the connection.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：对于在连接上发送的段，当前_键和rnext_键分别是首选的传出MKT和首选的传入MKT。

contents.text: o SET_AUTH.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o SET_AUTH.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Set/Get Authentication Parameters'
Parameters: key_id; key; and hmac_id
o GET_AUTH.TCP:
contents.zh-CHS: o 获取\u AUTH.TCP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: not specified
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：未指定

contents.text: Parameters: current_key and rnext_key
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：当前_键和rnext_键

contents.text: Comments: current_key and rnext_key are the preferred outgoing MKT and the preferred incoming MKT, respectively, that were carried on a recently received segment.
contents.zh-CHS: 备注：当前_键和rnext_键分别是首选的传出MKT和首选的传入MKT，它们是在最近接收到的段上进行的。

contents.text: o GET_AUTH.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o 获取_AUTH.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Set/Get Authentication Parameters'
Parameters: key_id and chunk_list
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：key\u id和chunk\u list

contents.text: o RESET_STREAM.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o 重置\u STREAM.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Add/Reset Streams, Reset Association'
Parameters: sid and direction
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：sid和方向

contents.text: o RESET_STREAM-EVENT.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o 重置\u STREAM-EVENT.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Stream Reset' notification
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“流重置”通知

contents.text: Parameters: information about the result of RESET_STREAM.SCTP
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：关于RESET_STREAM.SCTP结果的信息

contents.text: Comments: this is issued when the procedure for resetting streams has completed.
contents.zh-CHS: 备注：当重置流的程序完成时，会发出此消息。

contents.text: o RESET_ASSOC.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o 重置关联SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Add/Reset Streams, Reset Association'
Parameters: information related to the extension, as defined in [RFC3260]
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：与[RFC3260]中定义的扩展相关的信息

contents.text: o RESET_ASSOC-EVENT.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o 重置\u ASSOC-EVENT.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Association Reset' notification
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“关联重置”通知

contents.text: Parameters: information about the result of RESET_ASSOC.SCTP
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：关于RESET_ASSOC.SCTP结果的信息

contents.text: Comments: this is issued when the procedure for resetting an association has completed.
contents.zh-CHS: 备注：当重置关联的过程完成时发出此消息。

contents.text: o ADD_STREAM.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o 添加_STREAM.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Add/Reset Streams, Reset Association'
Parameters: number of outgoing and incoming streams to be added
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：要添加的传出流和传入流的数量

contents.text: o ADD_STREAM-EVENT.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o 添加\u STREAM-EVENT.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Stream Change' notification
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“流更改”通知

contents.text: Parameters: information about the result of ADD_STREAM.SCTP
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：关于ADD_STREAM.SCTP结果的信息

contents.text: Comments: this is issued when the procedure for adding a stream has completed.
contents.zh-CHS: 备注：当添加流的过程完成时发出此消息。

contents.text: o SET_STREAM_SCHEDULER.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o SET_STREAM_SCHEDULER.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Set Stream Scheduler'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“设置流计划程序”

contents.text: Parameters: scheduler identifier
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：调度程序标识符

contents.text: Comments: choice of First-Come, First-Served; Round-Robin; Round-Robin per Packet; Priority-Based; Fair Bandwidth; and Weighted Fair Queuing.
contents.zh-CHS: 备注：选择先到先得；循环赛；每包循环；基于优先级；公平带宽；加权公平排队。

contents.text: o CONFIGURE_STREAM_SCHEDULER.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o 配置\u STREAM\u SCHEDULER.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Configure Stream Scheduler'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“配置流计划程序”

contents.text: Parameters: priority
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：优先级

contents.text: Comments: the priority value only applies when Priority-Based or Weighted Fair Queuing scheduling is chosen with SET_STREAM_SCHEDULER.SCTP. The meaning of the parameter differs between these two schedulers, but in both cases, it realizes some form of prioritization regarding how bandwidth is divided among streams.
contents.zh-CHS: 备注：仅当使用SET_STREAM_SCHEDULER.SCTP选择基于优先级或加权公平队列调度时，优先级值才适用。参数的含义在这两个调度器之间有所不同，但在这两种情况下，它都实现了某种形式的优先级划分，即如何在流之间分配带宽。

contents.text: o SET_FLOWLABEL.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o SET_FLOWLABEL.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Set IPv6 Flow Label'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“设置IPv6流标签”

contents.text: Parameters: flow label
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：流标签

contents.text: Comments: this allows an application to change the IPv6 header's flow label field for outgoing packets on a path.
contents.zh-CHS: 备注：这允许应用程序为路径上的传出数据包更改IPv6标头的流标签字段。

contents.text: o AUTHENTICATION_NOTIFICATION-EVENT.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o 身份验证通知-EVENT.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Authentication' notification
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“身份验证”通知

contents.text: Returns: information regarding key management
contents.zh-CHS: 返回：有关密钥管理的信息

contents.text: o CONFIG_SEND_BUFFER.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o CONFIG_SEND_BUFFER.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Configure Send Buffer Size'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“配置发送缓冲区大小”

contents.text: Parameters: size value in octets
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：大小值（以八位字节为单位）

contents.text: o CONFIG_RECEIVE_BUFFER.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o CONFIG_RECEIVE_BUFFER.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Configure Receive Buffer Size'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“配置接收缓冲区大小”

contents.text: Parameters: size value in octets
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：大小值（以八位字节为单位）

contents.text: Comments: this controls the receiver window.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这控制接收器窗口。

contents.text: o CONFIG_FRAGMENTATION.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o CONFIG_FRAGMENTATION.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Configure Message Fragmentation'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“配置消息碎片”

contents.text:
Parameters: one boolean value (enable/disable) and maximum
fragmentation size (optional; default: PMTU)

Comments: if fragmentation is enabled, messages exceeding the maximum fragmentation size will be fragmented. If fragmentation is disabled, trying to send a message that exceeds the maximum fragmentation size will produce an error.
contents.zh-CHS: 备注：如果启用了分段，则超过最大分段大小的邮件将被分段。如果禁用碎片，尝试发送超过最大碎片大小的消息将产生错误。

contents.text: o CONFIG_PMTUD.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o CONFIG_PMTUD.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Configure Path MTU Discovery'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“配置路径MTU发现”

contents.text: Parameters: one boolean value (PMTUD on/off) and PMTU value (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：一个布尔值（PMTUD开/关）和PMTU值（可选）

contents.text: Returns: PMTU value
contents.zh-CHS: 返回：PMTU值

contents.text: Comments: this returns a meaningful PMTU value when PMTUD is enabled (the boolean is true), and the PMTU value can be set if PMTUD is disabled (the boolean is false).
contents.zh-CHS: 备注：启用PMTUD（布尔值为true）时，返回有意义的PMTU值；禁用PMTUD（布尔值为false）时，可以设置PMTU值。

contents.text: o CONFIG_DELAYED_SACK.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o CONFIG_DELAYED_SACK.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Configure Delayed SACK Timer'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“配置延迟SACK计时器”

contents.text:
Parameters: one boolean value (delayed SACK on/off); timer value
(optional); and number of packets to wait for (default 2)
Comments: if delayed SACK is enabled, SCTP will send a SACK either upon receiving the provided number of packets or when the timer expires, whatever occurs first.
contents.zh-CHS: 备注：如果启用了延迟SACK，SCTP将在收到提供的数据包数或计时器过期时发送SACK，无论先发生什么。

contents.text: o CONFIG_RTO.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o CONFIG_RTO.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Configure RTO Calculation'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“配置RTO计算”

contents.text: Parameters: init (optional); min (optional); and max (optional)
Comments: this adjusts the initial, minimum, and maximum RTO values.
contents.zh-CHS: 备注：这将调整初始、最小和最大RTO值。

contents.text: o SET_COOKIE_LIFE.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o 设置\u COOKIE\u LIFE.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Set Cookie Life Value'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“设置Cookie寿命值”

contents.text: Parameters: cookie life value
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：cookie寿命值

contents.text: o SET_MAX_BURST.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o 设置\u MAX\u BURST.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Set Maximum Burst'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“设置最大突发”

contents.text: Parameters: max burst value
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：最大突发值

contents.text: Comments: not all implementations allow values above the default of 4.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：并非所有实现都允许值高于默认值4。

contents.text: o SET_PARTIAL_DELIVERY_POINT.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o 设置部分交付点。SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Set Partial Delivery Point'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“设置部分传递点”

contents.text: Parameters: partial delivery point (integer)
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：部分交货点（整数）

contents.text: Comments: this parameter must be smaller or equal to the socket receive buffer size.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：此参数必须小于或等于套接字接收缓冲区大小。

contents.text: o SET_CHECKSUM_ENABLED.UDP:
contents.zh-CHS: o SET_CHECKSUM_ENABLED.UDP:

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Checksum_Enabled'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“已启用校验和”

contents.text: Parameters: 0 when zero checksum is used at sender, 1 for checksum at sender (default)
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：发送方使用零校验和时为0，发送方使用校验和时为1（默认值）

contents.text: o SET_CHECKSUM_REQUIRED.UDP:
contents.zh-CHS: o SET_CHECKSUM_REQUIRED.UDP:

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Require_Checksum'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“需要校验和”

contents.text: Parameter: 0 to allow zero checksum, 1 when a non-zero checksum is required (default) at the receiver
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：0允许零校验和，当接收器需要非零校验和（默认）时为1

contents.text: o SET_CHECKSUM_COVERAGE.UDP-Lite:
contents.zh-CHS: o 设置校验和覆盖率。UDP-Lite：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Set_Checksum_Coverage'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“设置校验和覆盖”

contents.text: Parameters: coverage length at sender (default maximum coverage)
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：发件人的覆盖范围长度（默认最大覆盖范围）

contents.text: o SET_MIN_CHECKSUM_COVERAGE.UDP-Lite:
contents.zh-CHS: o 设置\u最小\u校验和\u覆盖率。UDP-Lite：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Set_Min_Coverage'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“设置最小覆盖率”

contents.text: Parameter: coverage length at receiver (default minimum coverage)
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：接收器的覆盖长度（默认最小覆盖）

contents.text: o SET_DF.UDP(-Lite):
contents.zh-CHS: o SET_DF.UDP（-Lite）：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive event: 'Set_DF'
contents.zh-CHS: Pass 1基本事件：“Set_DF”

contents.text: Parameter: 0 when DF is not set (default) in the IPv4 header, 1 when DF is set
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：IPv4标头中未设置DF时为0（默认值），设置DF时为1

contents.text: o GET_MMS_S.UDP(-Lite):
contents.zh-CHS: o 获取MMS.UDP（-Lite）：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive event: 'Get_MM_S'
contents.zh-CHS: Pass 1基本事件：“Get_MM_S”

contents.text: Comments: this retrieves the maximum transport-message size that may be sent using a non-fragmented IP packet from the configured interface.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这将从配置的接口检索可能使用非分段IP数据包发送的最大传输消息大小。

contents.text: o GET_MMS_R.UDP(-Lite):
contents.zh-CHS: o 获取\u MMS\u R.UDP（-Lite）：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive event: 'Get_MMS_R'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1个基本事件：“获取彩信”

contents.text: Comments: this retrieves the maximum transport-message size that may be received from the configured interface.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这将检索可能从配置的接口接收的最大传输消息大小。

contents.text: o SET_TTL.UDP(-Lite) (IPV6_UNICAST_HOPS):
contents.zh-CHS: o 设置TTL.UDP（-Lite）（IPV6单播跳数）：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Set_TTL' and 'Set_IPV6_Unicast_Hops'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“设置TTL”和“设置IPV6单播跃点”

contents.text: Parameters: IPv4 TTL value or IPv6 Hop Count value
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：IPv4 TTL值或IPv6跃点计数值

contents.text: Comments: this allows an application to change the IPv4 TTL of IPv6 Hop Count value for outgoing UDP(-Lite) datagrams.
contents.zh-CHS: 备注：这允许应用程序更改传出UDP（-Lite）数据报的IPv6跃点的IPv4 TTL计数值。

contents.text: o GET_TTL.UDP(-Lite) (IPV6_UNICAST_HOPS):
contents.zh-CHS: o 获取TTL.UDP（-Lite）（IPV6单播跳数）：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Get_TTL' and 'Get_IPV6_Unicast_Hops'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“获取TTL”和“获取IPV6单播跃点”

contents.text: Returns: IPv4 TTL value or IPv6 Hop Count value
contents.zh-CHS: 返回：IPv4 TTL值或IPv6跃点计数值

contents.text: Comments: this allows an application to read the IPv4 TTL of the IPv6 Hop Count value from a received UDP(-Lite) datagram.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这允许应用程序从接收的UDP（-Lite）数据报读取IPv6跃点计数值的IPv4 TTL。

contents.text: o SET_ECN.UDP(-Lite):
contents.zh-CHS: o SET_ECN.UDP（-Lite）：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Set_ECN'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“Set\u ECN”

contents.text: Parameters: ECN value
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：ECN值

contents.text: Comments: this allows a UDP(-Lite) application to set the Explicit Congestion Notification (ECN) code point field for outgoing UDP(-Lite) datagrams. It defaults to sending '00'.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这允许UDP（-Lite）应用程序为传出UDP（-Lite）数据报设置显式拥塞通知（ECN）代码点字段。它默认为发送“00”。

contents.text: o GET_ECN.UDP(-Lite):
contents.zh-CHS: o 获取\u ECN.UDP（-Lite）：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Get_ECN'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“Get_ECN”

contents.text: Parameters: ECN value
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：ECN值

contents.text: Comments: this allows a UDP(-Lite) application to read the ECN code point field from a received UDP(-Lite) datagram.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这允许UDP（-Lite）应用程序从收到的UDP（-Lite）数据报读取ECN代码点字段。

contents.text: o SET_IP_OPTIONS.UDP(-Lite):
contents.zh-CHS: o 设置IP选项。UDP（-Lite）：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Set_IP_Options'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“设置IP选项”

contents.text: Parameters: options
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：选项

contents.text: Comments: this allows a UDP(-Lite) application to set IP options for outgoing UDP(-Lite) datagrams. These options can at least be the Source Route, Record Route, and Timestamp option.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这允许UDP（-Lite）应用程序为传出UDP（-Lite）数据报设置IP选项。这些选项至少可以是源路由、记录路由和时间戳选项。

contents.text: o GET_IP_OPTIONS.UDP(-Lite):
contents.zh-CHS: o 获取IP选项。UDP（-Lite）：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Get_IP_Options'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“获取IP选项”

contents.text: Returns: options
contents.zh-CHS: 返回：选项

contents.text: Comments: this allows a UDP(-Lite) application to receive any IP options that are contained in a received UDP(-Lite) datagram.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这允许UDP（-Lite）应用程序接收接收到的UDP（-Lite）数据报中包含的任何IP选项。

contents.text: o CONFIGURE.LEDBAT:
contents.zh-CHS: o CONFIGURE.LEDBAT：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: N/A

Parameters: enable (boolean); target; allowed_increase; gain_inc;
gain_dec; base_history; current_filter; init_cwnd; and min_cwnd
Comments: 'enable' is a newly invented parameter that enables or disables the whole LEDBAT service.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：“enable”是一个新发明的参数，用于启用或禁用整个LEDBAT服务。

contents.text: TERMINATION:
contents.zh-CHS: 终止：

contents.text: Gracefully or forcefully closing a connection or being informed about this event happening.
contents.zh-CHS: 优雅地或有力地关闭一个连接或被告知此事件的发生。

contents.text: o CLOSE.TCP:
contents.zh-CHS: o CLOSE.TCP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Close'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“关闭”

contents.text: Comments: this terminates the sending side of a connection after reliably delivering all remaining data.
contents.zh-CHS: 备注：这将在可靠地传递所有剩余数据后终止连接的发送端。

contents.text: o CLOSE.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o CLOSE.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Shutdown'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“关机”

contents.text: Comments: this terminates a connection after reliably delivering all remaining data.
contents.zh-CHS: 备注：这将在可靠地传递所有剩余数据后终止连接。

contents.text: o ABORT.TCP:
contents.zh-CHS: o ABORT.TCP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Abort'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“中止”

contents.text: Comments: this terminates a connection without delivering remaining data and sends an error message to the other side.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这会终止连接而不传递剩余数据，并向另一端发送错误消息。

contents.text: o ABORT.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o ABORT.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Abort'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“中止”

contents.text: Parameters: abort reason to be given to the peer (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：给对等方的中止原因（可选）

contents.text: Comments: this terminates a connection without delivering remaining data and sends an error message to the other side.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这会终止连接而不传递剩余数据，并向另一端发送错误消息。

contents.text: o ABORT.UDP(-Lite):
contents.zh-CHS: o 中止.UDP（-Lite）：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive event: 'Close'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1基本事件：“关闭”

contents.text: Comments: this terminates a connection without delivering remaining data. No further UDP(-Lite) datagrams are sent/received for this transport service instance.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这将终止连接，而不传递剩余数据。此传输服务实例不再发送/接收其他UDP（-Lite）数据报。

contents.text: o TIMEOUT.TCP:
contents.zh-CHS: o TIMEOUT.TCP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'User Timeout' event
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“用户超时”事件

contents.text: Comments: the application is informed that the connection is aborted. This event is executed on expiration of the timeout set in CONNECTION.ESTABLISHMENT.CONNECT.TCP (possibly adjusted in CONNECTION.MAINTENANCE.CHANGE_TIMEOUT.TCP).
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：通知应用程序连接已中止。此事件在CONNECTION.Establish.CONNECT.TCP中设置的超时过期时执行（可能在CONNECTION.MAINTENANCE.CHANGE\u timeout.TCP中进行了调整）。

contents.text: o TIMEOUT.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o TIMEOUT.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Communication Lost' event
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“通信丢失”事件

contents.text: Comments: the application is informed that the connection is aborted. This event is executed on expiration of the timeout that should be enabled by default (see the beginning of Section 8.3 in [RFC4960]) and was possibly adjusted in CONNECTION.MAINTENANCE.CHANGE_TIMEOOUT.SCTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：通知应用程序连接已中止。此事件在默认情况下应启用的超时过期时执行（请参阅[RFC4960]中第8.3节的开头），并可能在CONNECTION.MAINTENANCE.CHANGE\u TIMEOOUT.SCTP中进行了调整。

contents.text: o ABORT-EVENT.TCP:
contents.zh-CHS: o ABORT-EVENT.TCP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: not specified
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：未指定

contents.text: o ABORT-EVENT.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o ABORT-EVENT.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Communication Lost' event
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“通信丢失”事件

contents.text: Returns: abort reason from the peer (if available)
contents.zh-CHS: 返回：来自对等方的中止原因（如果可用）

contents.text: Comments: the application is informed that the other side has aborted the connection using CONNECTION.TERMINATION.ABORT.SCTP.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：应用程序被告知另一方已使用connection.TERMINATION.ABORT.SCTP中止连接。

contents.text: o CLOSE-EVENT.TCP:
contents.zh-CHS: o CLOSE-EVENT.TCP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: not specified
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：未指定

contents.text: o CLOSE-EVENT.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o CLOSE-EVENT.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Shutdown Complete' event
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“关机完成”事件

contents.text: Comments: the application is informed that CONNECTION.TERMINATION.CLOSE.SCTP was successfully completed.
contents.zh-CHS: 备注：通知应用程序CONNECTION.TERMINATION.CLOSE.SCTP已成功完成。

contents.text: 4.2. DATA-Transfer-Related Primitives
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2. 数据传输相关原语

contents.text: All primitives in this section refer to an existing connection, i.e., a connection that was either established or made available for receiving data (although this is optional for the primitives of UDP(-Lite)). In addition to the listed parameters, all sending primitives contain a reference to a data block, and all receiving primitives contain a reference to available buffer space for the data. Note that CONNECT.TCP and LISTEN.TCP in the ESTABLISHMENT and AVAILABILITY categories also allow to transfer data (an optional user message) before the connection is fully established.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节中的所有原语均指现有连接，即已建立或可用于接收数据的连接（尽管这对于UDP（-Lite）原语是可选的）。除了列出的参数外，所有发送原语都包含对数据块的引用，所有接收原语都包含对数据可用缓冲区空间的引用。请注意，“建立”和“可用性”类别中的CONNECT.TCP和LISTEN.TCP还允许在完全建立连接之前传输数据（可选用户消息）。

contents.text: o SEND.TCP:
contents.zh-CHS: o SEND.TCP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Send'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“发送”

contents.text: Parameters: timeout (optional); current_key (optional); and rnext_key (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：超时（可选）；当前_键（可选）；和rnext_键（可选）

contents.text: Comments: this gives TCP a data block for reliable transmission to the TCP on the other side of the connection. The timeout can be configured with this call (see also CONNECTION.MAINTENANCE.CHANGE_TIMEOUT.TCP). 'current_key' and 'rnext_key' are authentication parameters that can be configured with this call (see also CONNECTION.MAINTENANCE.SET_AUTH.TCP).
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这为TCP提供了一个数据块，用于可靠地传输到连接另一端的TCP。可以通过此调用配置超时（另请参阅CONNECTION.MAINTENANCE.CHANGE\u timeout.TCP）“当前_密钥”和“rnext_密钥”是可通过此调用配置的身份验证参数（另请参阅CONNECTION.MAINTENANCE.SET_AUTH.TCP）。

contents.text: o SEND.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o SEND.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Send'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“发送”

contents.text: Comments: this gives SCTP a data block for transmission to the SCTP on the other side of the connection (SCTP association). The 'stream number' denotes the stream to be used. The 'context' number can later be used to refer to the correct message when an error is reported. The 'socket' can be used to state which path should be preferred, if there are multiple paths available (see also CONNECTION.MAINTENANCE.SETPRIMARY.SCTP). The data block can be delivered out of order if the 'unordered' flag is set. The 'no-bundle flag' can be set to indicate a preference to avoid bundling. The 'payload protocol-id' is a number that will, if provided, be handed over to the receiving application. Using pr-policy and pr-value, the level of reliability can be controlled. The 'sack-immediately' flag can be used to indicate
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这为SCTP提供了一个数据块，用于传输到连接另一侧的SCTP（SCTP关联）。“流编号”表示要使用的流。“上下文”编号可在以后报告错误时用于引用正确的消息。如果有多条路径可用，“套接字”可用于说明首选路径（另请参见CONNECTION.MAINTENANCE.SETPRIMARY.SCTP）。如果设置了“无序”标志，则数据块可能会无序交付。可以设置“无捆绑标志”以指示避免捆绑的首选项。“有效负载协议id”是一个数字，如果提供，将移交给接收应用程序。使用pr策略和pr值，可以控制可靠性水平。“立即解雇”标志可用于指示

contents.text: that the peer should not delay the sending of a SACK corresponding to the provided user message. If specified, the provided key-id is used for authenticating the user message.
contents.zh-CHS: 对等方不应延迟发送与所提供的用户消息相对应的SACK。如果指定，则提供的密钥id用于验证用户消息。

contents.text: o SEND.UDP(-Lite):
contents.zh-CHS: o SEND.UDP（-Lite）：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Send'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“发送”

contents.text: Parameters: IP address and port number of the destination endpoint (optional if connected)
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：目标端点的IP地址和端口号（如果已连接，则可选）

contents.text: Comments: this provides a message for unreliable transmission using UDP(-Lite) to the specified transport address. The IP address and port number may be omitted for connected UDP(-Lite) sockets. All CONNECTION.MAINTENANCE.SET_*.UDP(-Lite) primitives apply per message sent.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这提供了一条使用UDP（-Lite）到指定传输地址的不可靠传输消息。对于已连接的UDP（-Lite）套接字，可以省略IP地址和端口号。所有CONNECTION.MAINTENANCE.SET.*.UDP（-Lite）原语适用于发送的每条消息。

contents.text: o RECEIVE.TCP:
contents.zh-CHS: o RECEIVE.TCP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Receive'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“接收”

contents.text: Parameters: current_key (optional) and rnext_key (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：当前_键（可选）和rnext_键（可选）

contents.text: Comments: 'current_key' and 'rnext_key' are authentication parameters that can be read with this call (see also CONNECTION.MAINTENANCE.GET_AUTH.TCP).
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：“current_key”和“rnext_key”是可通过此调用读取的身份验证参数（另请参阅CONNECTION.MAINTENANCE.GET_AUTH.TCP）。

contents.text: o RECEIVE.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o RECEIVE.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Data Arrive' notification, followed by 'Receive'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“数据到达”通知，后跟“接收”

contents.text: Parameters: stream number (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：流编号（可选）

contents.text: Returns: stream sequence number (optional) and partial flag (optional)
contents.zh-CHS: 返回：流序列号（可选）和部分标志（可选）

contents.text: Comments: if the 'stream number' is provided, the call to receive only receives data on one particular stream. If a partial message arrives, this is indicated by the 'partial flag', and then the 'stream sequence number' must be provided such that an application can restore the correct order of data blocks that comprise an entire message.
contents.zh-CHS: 备注：如果提供了“流编号”，则receive调用只接收一个特定流上的数据。如果部分消息到达，则由“部分标志”指示，然后必须提供“流序列号”，以便应用程序可以恢复组成整个消息的数据块的正确顺序。

contents.text: o RECEIVE.UDP(-Lite):
contents.zh-CHS: o RECEIVE.UDP（-Lite）：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Receive'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“接收”

contents.text: Parameters: buffer for received datagram
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：接收数据报的缓冲区

contents.text: Comments: all CONNECTION.MAINTENANCE.GET_*.UDP(-Lite) primitives apply per message received.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：所有CONNECTION.MAINTENANCE.GET.*.UDP（-Lite）原语适用于收到的每条消息。

contents.text: o SENDFAILURE-EVENT.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o SENDFAILURE-EVENT.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Send Failure' notification, optionally followed by 'Receive Unsent Message' or 'Receive Unacknowledged Message'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“发送失败”通知，可选后跟“接收未发送消息”或“接收未确认消息”

contents.text:
Returns: cause code; context; and unsent or unacknowledged message
(optional)

Comments: 'cause code' indicates the reason of the failure, and 'context' is the context number if such a number has been provided in DATA.SEND.SCTP, for later use with 'Receive Unsent Message' or 'Receive Unacknowledged Message', respectively. These primitives can be used to retrieve the unsent or unacknowledged message (or part of the message, in case a part was delivered) if desired.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：“原因代码”表示故障原因，“上下文”是上下文编号（如果DATA.SEND.SCTP中提供了此编号），以供以后分别与“接收未发送消息”或“接收未确认消息”一起使用。如果需要，这些原语可用于检索未发送或未确认的消息（或消息的一部分，如果部分已交付）。

contents.text: o SEND_FAILURE.UDP(-Lite):
contents.zh-CHS: o 发送失败。UDP（-Lite）：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Send'
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“发送”

contents.text: Comments: this may be used to probe for the effective PMTU when using in combination with the 'MAINTENANCE.SET_DF' primitive.
contents.zh-CHS: 备注：当与“MAINTENANCE.SET_DF”原语结合使用时，这可用于探测有效的PMTU。

contents.text: o SENDER_DRY-EVENT.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o 发送方\u DRY-EVENT.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Sender Dry' notification
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“发件人干燥”通知

contents.text: Comments: this informs the application that the stack has no more user data to send.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这会通知应用程序堆栈没有更多的用户数据要发送。

contents.text: o PARTIAL_DELIVERY_ABORTED-EVENT.SCTP:
contents.zh-CHS: o 部分交付\u中止-EVENT.SCTP：

contents.text: Pass 1 primitive/event: 'Partial Delivery Aborted' notification
contents.zh-CHS: 传递1原语/事件：“部分传递已中止”通知

contents.text: Comments: this informs the receiver of a partial message that the further delivery of the message has been aborted.
contents.zh-CHS: 注释：这会通知部分消息的接收者消息的进一步传递已中止。

contents.text: 5. Pass 3
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 通过3

contents.text: This section presents the superset of all transport features in all protocols that were discussed in the preceding sections, based on the list of primitives in pass 2 but also on text in pass 1 to include transport features that can be configured in one protocol and are static properties in another (congestion control, for example). Again, some minor details are omitted for the sake of generalization -- e.g., TCP may provide various different IP options, but only source route is mandatory to implement, and this detail is not visible in the pass 3 transport feature "Specify IP options". As before, "UDP(-Lite)" represents both UDP and UDP-Lite, and "TCP" refers to both TCP and MPTCP.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节根据第2阶段中的原语列表以及第1阶段中的文本，展示了前面章节讨论的所有协议中所有传输功能的超集，以包括可以在一个协议中配置且在另一个协议中是静态属性的传输功能（例如，拥塞控制）。同样，为了一般化，省略了一些次要细节——例如，TCP可能提供各种不同的IP选项，但只有源路由是必须实现的，并且在pass 3传输功能“Specify IP options”（指定IP选项）中看不到该细节。如前所述，“UDP（-Lite）”表示UDP和UDP Lite，“TCP”表示TCP和MPTCP。

contents.text: 5.2. DATA-Transfer-Related Transport Features
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2. 与数据传输相关的传输特性

contents.text: All transport features in this section refer to an existing connection, i.e., a connection that was either established or made available for receiving data. Note that TCP allows the transfer of data (a single optional user message, possibly arriving multiple times) before the connection is fully established. Reliable data transfer entails delay -- e.g., for the sender to wait until it can transmit data or due to retransmission in case of packet loss.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节中的所有传输功能均指现有连接，即已建立或可用于接收数据的连接。请注意，TCP允许在连接完全建立之前传输数据（单个可选用户消息，可能多次到达）。可靠的数据传输需要延迟——例如，发送方等待，直到它可以传输数据，或者在数据包丢失的情况下由于重新传输。

contents.text: 5.2.1. Sending Data
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2.1. 发送数据

contents.text: All transport features in this section are provided by DATA.SEND from pass 2. DATA.SEND is given a data block from the application, which here we call a "message" if the beginning and end of the data block can be identified at the receiver, and "data" otherwise.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节中的所有传输功能均由DATA.SEND from pass 2提供。DATA.SEND从应用程序中获得一个数据块，如果数据块的开始和结束可以在接收方识别，则在这里我们称之为“消息”，否则称之为“数据”。

contents.text: o Reliably transfer data, with congestion control Protocols: TCP
contents.zh-CHS: o 使用拥塞控制协议（TCP）可靠地传输数据

contents.text: o Reliably transfer a message, with congestion control Protocols: SCTP
contents.zh-CHS: o 使用拥塞控制协议（SCTP）可靠地传输消息

contents.text: o Unreliably transfer a message, with congestion control Protocols: SCTP
contents.zh-CHS: o 使用拥塞控制协议（SCTP）不可靠地传输消息

contents.text: o Unreliably transfer a message, without congestion control Protocols: UDP(-Lite)
contents.zh-CHS: o 不可靠地传输消息，没有拥塞控制协议：UDP（-Lite）

contents.text: o Configurable Message Reliability Protocols: SCTP
contents.zh-CHS: o 可配置消息可靠性协议：SCTP

contents.text: o Choice of stream Protocols: SCTP
contents.zh-CHS: o 流协议的选择：SCTP

contents.text: o Choice of path (destination address) Protocols: SCTP
contents.zh-CHS: o 路径（目标地址）协议的选择：SCTP

contents.text: o Ordered message delivery (potentially slower than unordered) Protocols: SCTP
contents.zh-CHS: o 有序消息传递（可能比无序消息传递慢）协议：SCTP

contents.text: o Unordered message delivery (potentially faster than ordered) Protocols: SCTP and UDP(-Lite)
contents.zh-CHS: o 无序消息传递（可能快于有序）协议：SCTP和UDP（-Lite）

contents.text: o Request not to bundle messages Protocols: SCTP
contents.zh-CHS: o 请求不捆绑消息协议：SCTP

contents.text: o Specifying a 'payload protocol-id' (handed over as such by the receiver) Protocols: SCTP
contents.zh-CHS: o 指定“有效负载协议id”（由接收方移交）协议：SCTP

contents.text: o Specifying a key identifier to be used to authenticate a message Protocols: SCTP
contents.zh-CHS: o 指定用于验证消息的密钥标识符协议：SCTP

contents.text: o Request not to delay the acknowledgement (SACK) of a message Protocols: SCTP
contents.zh-CHS: o 请求不延迟消息协议的确认（SACK）：SCTP

contents.text: 5.2.2. Receiving Data
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2.2. 接收数据

contents.text: All transport features in this section are provided by DATA.RECEIVE from pass 2. DATA.RECEIVE fills a buffer provided by the application, with what here we call a "message" if the beginning and end of the data block can be identified at the receiver, and "data" otherwise.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节中的所有传输功能均由DATA.RECEIVE from pass 2提供。DATA.RECEIVE填充由应用程序提供的缓冲区，如果数据块的开始和结束可以在接收方识别，则在这里我们称之为“消息”，否则称为“数据”。

contents.text: o Receive data (with no message delimiting) Protocols: TCP
contents.zh-CHS: o 接收数据（无消息分隔）协议：TCP

contents.text: o Receive a message Protocols: SCTP and UDP(-Lite)
contents.zh-CHS: o 接收消息协议：SCTP和UDP（-Lite）

contents.text: o Choice of stream to receive from Protocols: SCTP
contents.zh-CHS: o 选择从协议接收的流：SCTP

contents.text: o Information about partial message arrival Protocols: SCTP Comments: in SCTP, partial messages are combined with a stream sequence number so that the application can restore the correct order of data blocks an entire message consists of.
contents.zh-CHS: o 有关部分消息到达协议的信息：SCTP注释：在SCTP中，部分消息与流序列号组合，以便应用程序可以恢复整个消息所包含的数据块的正确顺序。

contents.text: 5.2.3. Errors
This section describes sending failures that are associated with a specific call to DATA.SEND from pass 2.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节介绍与特定DATA.SEND from pass 2调用关联的发送失败。

contents.text: o Notification of an unacknowledged (part of a) message Protocols: SCTP

contents.zh-CHS: o 通知接收方部分消息传递已中止协议：SCTP

contents.zh-CHS: 6. IANA考虑

contents.zh-CHS: 本文件不要求IANA采取任何行动。

contents.text: 7. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 安全考虑

contents.text: Authentication, confidentiality protection, and integrity protection are identified as transport features [RFC8095]. These transport features are generally provided by a protocol or layer on top of the transport protocol; none of the transport protocols considered in this document provides these transport features on its own. Therefore, these transport features are not considered in this document, with the exception of native authentication capabilities of TCP and SCTP for which the security considerations in [RFC5925] and [RFC4895] apply.
contents.zh-CHS: 身份验证、机密性保护和完整性保护被标识为传输功能[RFC8095]。这些传输特性通常由传输协议之上的协议或层提供；本文档中考虑的传输协议均未单独提供这些传输功能。因此，除了[RFC5925]和[RFC4895]中的安全注意事项适用的TCP和SCTP的本机身份验证功能外，本文档不考虑这些传输功能。

contents.text: Security considerations for the use of UDP and UDP-Lite are provided in the referenced RFCs. Security guidance for application usage is provided in the UDP Guidelines [RFC8085].
contents.zh-CHS: 参考的RFC中提供了使用UDP和UDP Lite的安全注意事项。UDP指南[RFC8085]中提供了应用程序使用的安全指南。

contents.text: Appendix B. How This Document Was Developed
contents.zh-CHS: 附录B.本文件是如何编制的

contents.text: This section gives an overview of the method that was used to develop this document. It was given to contributors for guidance, and it can be helpful for future updates or extensions.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节概述了用于编制本文档的方法。它被提供给贡献者以供指导，并且它可以对将来的更新或扩展有所帮助。

contents.text: This document is only concerned with transport features that are explicitly exposed to applications via primitives. It also strictly follows RFC text: if a transport feature is truly relevant for an application, the RFCs should say so, and they should describe how to use and configure it. Thus, the approach followed for developing this document was to identify the right RFCs, then analyze and process their text.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档仅涉及通过原语显式公开给应用程序的传输特性。它还严格遵循RFC文本：如果传输特性确实与应用程序相关，RFC应该这样说，并且应该描述如何使用和配置它。因此，制定本文件所采用的方法是确定正确的RFC，然后分析和处理其文本。

contents.text: Primitives that "MAY" be implemented by a transport protocol were excluded. To be included, the minimum requirement level for a primitive to be implemented by a protocol was "SHOULD". Where style requirement levels as described in [RFC2119] are not used, primitives were excluded when they are described in conjunction with statements like, e.g., "some implementations also provide" or "an implementation may also". Excluded primitives or parameters were briefly described in a dedicated subsection.
contents.zh-CHS: 排除了“可能”由传输协议实现的原语。要包括在内，协议要实现的原语的最低要求级别是“应该”。如果未使用[RFC2119]中所述的样式需求级别，则当原语与诸如“某些实现还提供”或“某个实现也可以”之类的语句一起描述时，它们被排除在外。排除的原语或参数在专用小节中进行了简要描述。

contents.text: Pass 1: This began by identifying text that talks about primitives. An API specification, abstract or not, obviously describes primitives -- but we are not *only* interested in API specifications. The text describing the 'Send' primitive in the API specified in [RFC0793],
contents.zh-CHS: 第1步：首先确定谈论原语的文本。API规范，不管是抽象的还是非抽象的，显然描述了原语——但我们不仅仅对API规范感兴趣。[RFC0793]中指定的API中描述“发送”原语的文本，

contents.text: for instance, does not say that data transfer is reliable. TCP's reliability is clear, however, from this text in Section 1 of [RFC0793]:
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，并不是说数据传输是可靠的。然而，从[RFC0793]第1节中的文本可以清楚地看出TCP的可靠性：

contents.text: The Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) is intended for use as a highly reliable host-to-host protocol between hosts in packet-switched computer communication networks, and in interconnected systems of such networks.
contents.zh-CHS: 传输控制协议（TCP）旨在用作分组交换计算机通信网络中主机之间以及此类网络的互连系统中的高度可靠的主机对主机协议。

contents.text: Some text for the pass 1 subsections was developed by copying and pasting all the relevant text parts from the relevant RFCs then adjusting the terminology to match that in Section 2 and shortening phrasing to match the general style of the document. An effort was made to formulate everything as a primitive description such that the primitive descriptions became as complete as possible (e.g., the 'SEND.TCP' primitive in pass 2 is explicitly described as reliably transferring data); text that is relevant for the primitives presented in this pass but still does not fit directly under any primitive was used in a subsection's introduction.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过复制和粘贴相关RFC中的所有相关文本部分，然后调整术语，使其与第2节中的术语相匹配，并缩短措辞，使其与文件的一般风格相匹配，从而形成了pass 1小节的一些文本。努力将所有内容表述为基本描述，以使基本描述尽可能完整（例如，第2阶段中的“SEND.TCP”基本描述明确描述为可靠传输数据）；在一小节的引言中使用了与本节中介绍的原语相关但仍不直接适用于任何原语的文本。

contents.text: Pass 2: The main goal of this pass is unification of primitives. As input, only text from pass 1 was used (no exterior sources). The list in pass 2 is not arranged by protocol (i.e., "first protocol X, here are all the primitives; then protocol Y, here are all the primitives, ...") but by primitive (i.e., "primitive A, implemented this way in protocol X, this way in protocol Y, ..."). It was a goal to obtain as many similar pass 2 primitives as possible. For instance, this was sometimes achieved by not always maintaining a 1:1 mapping between pass 1 and pass 2 primitives, renaming primitives, etc. For every new primitive, the already-existing primitives were considered to try to make them as coherent as possible.
contents.zh-CHS: 过程2：这个过程的主要目标是原语的统一。作为输入，仅使用过程1中的文本（无外部源）。过程2中的列表不是按协议排列的（即，“第一个协议X，这里是所有的原语；然后协议Y，这里是所有的原语，…”），而是按原语排列的（即，“原语A，在协议X中以这种方式实现，在协议Y中以这种方式实现，…”）。目标是获得尽可能多的类似pass 2原语。例如，有时通过不总是在过程1和过程2基本体之间保持1:1映射、重命名基本体等来实现。对于每个新的基本体，都会考虑现有的基本体，以使它们尽可能一致。

contents.text: For each primitive, the following style was used:
contents.zh-CHS: 对于每个基本体，使用了以下样式：

contents.text: o PRIMITIVENAME.PROTOCOL: Pass 1 primitive/event: Parameters: Returns: Comments:
contents.zh-CHS: o PRIMITIVENAME.PROTOCOL:传递1原语/事件：参数：返回：注释：

contents.text: The entries "Parameters", "Returns", and "Comments" were skipped when a primitive had no parameters, no described return value, or no comments seemed necessary, respectively. Optional parameters are followed by "(optional)". When known, default values were provided.
contents.zh-CHS: 当原语分别没有参数、没有描述的返回值或似乎没有必要注释时，将跳过条目“Parameters”、“Returns”和“Comments”。可选参数后跟“（可选）”。已知时，会提供默认值。

contents.text: Pass 3: The main point of this pass is to identify transport features that are the result of static properties of protocols, for which all protocols have to be listed together; this is then the final list of
contents.zh-CHS: 过程3：此过程的要点是识别协议静态属性的结果传输特性，所有协议必须一起列出；这是最后一张名单

contents.text: all available transport features. This list was primarily based on text from pass 2, with additional input from pass 1 (but no external sources).
contents.zh-CHS: 所有可用的传输功能。该列表主要基于pass2中的文本，以及pass1中的额外输入（但没有外部源）。
